resources.string: WELCOME TO ISLAMIC SOCIAL\n RESPONSIBILITY ASSESSMENT SYSTEM\n (I-SRAS)

The Islamic Social Responsibility Assessment System (I-SRAS) is developed to provide an assessment for Islamic-based organizations as self-check tool of their social responsibility-related programmes, activities and initiatives. This tool aims to ensure that all social responsibility practices undertaken are prioritized and in conformance with the Islamic laws (Shariah).

I-SRAS contains two primary form of assessment, which include: 
 
 1. An assessment of the current sosial responsibility conformance to i-CSR best practice social responsibility guidelines for Islamic organizations.

 2. An outline of suggested actions required to address deficiencies identified by the system during the assessment.
